original_text: But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.
korean_text: 누구든지 자기 친족 특히 자기 가족을 돌보지 아니하면 믿음을 배반한 자요 불신자보다 더 악한 자니라

sentences.original_text: But if any provide not for his own
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 누가 자기 가족을 부양하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: and specially for those of his own house
and is worse than an infidel
